clinical_study.brief_title: Examining the Impact of Tampon Use on the Vaginal Microbiota
clinical_study.official_title: Examining the Impact of Tampon Use on the Vaginal Microbiota

brief_summary.textblock: The vaginal microbiota is the community of bacteria in the vagina. The composition of the vaginal microbiota (which bacteria are present and how many of each are present) is known to affect vaginal health and contribute to the development of bacterial vaginosis (the largest cause of vaginal discharge and malodor, and the most common vaginal disorder). It is also known that the composition of the vaginal microbiota changes across a menstrual cycle with the largest changes happening during a woman's period. However, it is not know how tampon use affects vaginal microbiota composition. This study is being done to learn what effect tampon use has on vaginal microbiota composition during a woman's period and between periods.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Subjects use Tampon A and Tampon B exclusively for one menstrual cycle each (consecutive menstrual cycles) followed by returning to their standard tampon use for the third consecutive menstrual cycle.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in relative abundance of Lactobacillus species
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, end of third menstrual cycle (approximately 14 weeks)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in relative abundance of Gardnerella vaginalis
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, end of third menstrual cycle (approximately 14 weeks)

arm_group.description: Subjects provided with 24 Tampax Pearl Regular Tampons to use exclusively for one of two consecutive menstrual periods. Subjects use these tampons according to normal tampon use.
Subjects provided with 24 Playtex Gentle Glide 360 Regular Tampons to use exclusively for one of two consecutive menstrual periods. Subjects use these tampons according to normal tampon use.
Subjects use own tampons according to normal tampon use for third menstrual period after first two menstrual periods with Tampon A and Tampon B.

intervention.description: 24 Tampax Pearl Regular Tampons for use during a single menstrual period.
24 Playtex Gentle Glide 360 Regular Tampons for use during a single menstrual period.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- regular menstrual cycles lasting 21-35 days
- menses lasting for at least 4 days
- current tampon user
- good self-reported general health
- good self-reported vaginal health
Exclusion Criteria:
- currently pregnant
- planning to become pregnant in 4 months following enrollment
- difficulty using tampons
- current toxic shock syndrome
- history of toxic shock syndrome
- current sexually transmitted infection
- current urinary tract infection
- currently using antibiotics
- antibiotic use in 4 weeks prior to enrollment
- current antifungal use
- antifungal use in 4 weeks prior to enrollment
- autoimmune condition
